title: Admin Dashboard Real-Time Data Refresh
description: Verify that the admin dashboard loads accurate real-time data initially and updates every 30 seconds with fresh system health, user activity, and revenue data.

steps.description: Admin logs in with valid credentials and 2FA.
Navigate to the admin dashboard.
Verify all stats cards display correct initial data (users, generations, revenue, templates).
Verify charts render accurate usage and system health data.
Wait for 30 seconds.
Verify that dashboard data automatically refreshes to reflect the latest state.

title: User Management - Search, Filter, and Sort
description: Ensure the admin can search users by name/email, apply filters (status, activity), and sort user lists correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to user management page.
Input partial and full search terms for username and email.
Verify that search results only include users matching the terms.
Apply filters such as active, banned, and suspended users.
Verify that user list updates to reflect selected filters.
Sort users by registration date, last activity, and points.
Verify sorting order is correct and stable.

title: User Management - Edit Profile and Adjust Points
description: Verify that admin can edit user profile details and adjust user points, and changes are saved and reflected correctly.

steps.description: Select a user from user list.
Edit fields such as username, email, and user status.
Adjust user points credit/debit with valid values.
Save changes.
Verify profile updates are reflected in user details.
Verify points changes are visible in user transaction and activity history.

title: User Management - Ban, Suspend, and Bulk Actions
description: Test banning and suspending individual users and performing bulk operations with multiple user selections.

steps.description: Select a single user and ban the user.
Verify user status changes to banned and user is prevented from access.
Select multiple users using checkboxes.
Perform bulk suspension on selected users.
Verify all selected users have updated suspended status.

title: Creator Applications - Review and Approval Workflow
description: Verify admin can review pending creator applications, examine applicant details, receive AI quality checks, approve or reject with feedback, and trigger notifications.

steps.description: Navigate to creator applications page.
Verify that all pending applications are listed with summary info.
Open detailed view of an application.
Verify application details, including supplementary info and AI quality check results are present.
Approve the application with feedback.
Verify application status updates accordingly.
Verify notification sent to applicant about decision.
Reject another application with feedback.
Verify rejected status and notification sent.

title: Creator Management - Earnings Tracking and Withdrawal Processing
description: Ensure admin can view creator earnings and successfully verify and process withdrawal requests with bank verification steps.

steps.description: Navigate to creator management page.
Select a creator and view detailed earnings history.
Verify displayed earnings match transaction records.
Open withdrawal request pending verification.
Validate requested bank details and verify supporting documents.
Approve withdrawal and trigger payout process.
Verify withdrawal status updates to processed and creator is notified.

title: Template Management - Status Views and AI Quality Checks
description: Verify template status-based views function correctly and AI-powered auto quality checks enforce proper approval criteria.

steps.description: Navigate to template management page.
Switch views between pending, approved, rejected templates.
Verify templates displayed correspond to selected status filter.
Select a pending template and run AI auto quality check.
Verify AI check returns quality score and flags (if any).
Approve template manually after review.
Verify template status updates and is included in approved views.

title: Content Moderation - Auto-Flagging, Manual Review, and Strike Enforcement
description: Validate content moderation pipeline where AI auto-flagging adds items to manual review queue, strikes are issued per policy, bans triggered on strike limits, and appeals workflow functions correctly.

steps.description: Inject content with banned keywords to trigger auto-flagging.
Verify content appears in manual review queue with correct flags.
Moderator reviews flagged content and issues a strike.
Verify strike is logged and user strike count updated.
User accumulates maximum strikes.
Verify user is automatically banned per policy.
User submits appeal for banned content.
Moderator reviews appeal and either upholds ban or reinstates user.
Verify appeal result is recorded and user notified.

title: Wallet & Transactions - Multi-Gateway Payments and Promo Code Application
description: Ensure multiple payment gateways function correctly, transactions are recorded, promo codes apply discounts accurately, and user wallet balances update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to payment settings and verify multiple gateway configurations.
Perform a user payment using each configured gateway.
Verify transaction records include accurate gateway info and statuses.
Create and apply a valid promo code.
Verify promo code discount applied to transaction and wallet balance credited.
Attempt payment with expired or invalid promo code.
Verify payment is rejected with appropriate error message.

title: Wallet & Transactions - Refund Processing and Financial Analytics
description: Verify that refunds are processed securely, trigger reversal in user and creator balances, reflect in transaction history, and analytics reports update accordingly.

steps.description: Select a completed transaction eligible for refund.
Process a full and partial refund.
Verify user wallet balance reflects refund.
Verify creator earnings are adjusted if applicable.
Check updated transaction history for refund record.
Access financial analytics dashboard.
Verify financial reports reflect refund impacts.

title: AI Configuration - Model Selection, API Key Management, and Cost Settings
description: Test admin's ability to switch active AI generation models, add/update/revoke API keys, configure cost parameters, and validate these changes affect performance and reported analytics.

steps.description: Navigate to AI Configuration page.
Select a different AI model as active.
Verify generation requests use the selected model.
Add a new API key with valid credentials.
Verify key is stored securely and displayed masked.
Revoke an existing API key.
Verify revoked key is disabled for API calls.
Adjust cost settings (e.g., max budget, cost per generation).
Verify cost changes reflected in generation cost analytics.

title: Admin & System Settings - Admin Role Management and 2FA Enforcement
description: Validate creation, editing, and deletion of admin user roles with detailed permissions and enforce two-factor authentication during login.

steps.description: Navigate to admin user roles management.
Create a new admin role with specific permissions.
Verify newly created role appears with correct permissions.
Assign role to an admin user.
Attempt to access restricted features with that user.
Verify access is granted or denied per role permissions.
Log in as admin user with 2FA enabled.
Provide correct email and password.
Enter valid 2FA code.
Verify successful login and access to system.
Attempt login with invalid 2FA code.
Verify login is rejected with 2FA error.

title: Reports & Analytics - Generate, Filter, Export, and Schedule
description: Ensure that reports can be generated with customizable filters and date ranges, exported correctly in multiple formats, and scheduled for automated delivery.

steps.description: Navigate to reports & analytics section.
Select report type (user, generation, revenue, moderation).
Apply filters such as date range, user segments, template categories.
Generate the report.
Verify report data matches filters and criteria.
Export report in PDF and CSV formats.
Verify exported files contain correct report data and formatting.
Schedule a report for daily email delivery.
Verify scheduled report emails are sent at configured times.

title: Support & Tickets - Ticket Lifecycle and Prioritization
description: Test the full ticket lifecycle including creating tickets, assigning, replying with canned responses, escalating, closing, and tracking customer satisfaction.

steps.description: Navigate to support tickets section.
Create a new ticket on behalf of a user.
Verify ticket is created with correct initial status and priority.
Assign ticket to a support agent.
Verify assignment notification sent and ticket status updated.
Add replies using canned responses.
Verify reply is recorded with timestamp and agent info.
Escalate ticket to higher support tier.
Verify escalation changes ticket priority and triggers notification.
Close the ticket after resolution.
Capture customer satisfaction rating.
Verify final ticket status is closed and satisfaction rating recorded.

title: Security - Password Policy, IP Restrictions, Session Timeout, and Audit Logging
description: Validate enforcement of password complexity and expiration policies, IP address login restrictions, session timeout due to inactivity, and accurate audit logs for critical admin actions.

steps.description: Attempt to set an admin password that does not meet complexity requirements.
Verify password change is rejected with appropriate error.
Log in from an allowed IP address.
Verify successful login.
Log in from a disallowed IP address.
Verify login is blocked with security warning.
Remain inactive beyond configured session timeout period.
Verify session expires and re-login is required.
Perform actions like user ban, role change, and payment configuration update.
Verify audit log captures user, timestamp, action details correctly.
